NO_ALTING: <:_:979009081325019156> You are only allowed to use **1** singular account to play and engage with Sofi
NO_HELPING_ALTERS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not support or interact with alters and scammers. If you have suspicions about a user, please report them to staff
NO_EXPLOITING_BUGS: <:_:979009081325019156> Any and all bugs/exploits you find are to be reported immediately! Failure to comply with this rule will be punished
NO_BUY_SELL_ACCOUNTS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not engage in the process of buying or selling entire discord accounts
NO_FARMING: <:_:979009081325019156> You must not use your social media standing to gain any resources or cards on Sofi
NO_SELFBOT: <:_:979009081325019156> The use of macros and bots to gain an advantage is strictly prohibited
DO_NOT_ALT: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not alt or use multiple accounts to play Sofi. Self report to avoid penalties.
DO_NOT_HELP_ALTS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not help, encourage or participate in servers that alt or scam people.
DO_NOT_EXPLOIT_BUGS: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not exploit bugs and report them immediately to Staff.
DO_NOT_SCAM: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not try to cheat or scam players. You will be banned from playing.
DO_NOT_FARM: <:_:979009081325019156> Farming currency using social influence isn't allowed. Report such users.
DO_NOT_USE_CRYPTO: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not use crypto to trade items in Sofi and always put reason for trade in notes.
DO_NOT_SCAMMED_ITEMS: <:_:979009081325019156> Scammed and alted items will be removed regardless of how you got them.
DO_NOT_SIBLINGS: <:_:979009081325019156> Siblings will be held responsible together if any one of them is found breaking rules.
DO_NOT_CHANGE_EMAIL: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not change emails if someone asks you to: Thats not a discord staff but a scammer.
VISIT_SUPPORT: Visit our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/XPsQKJjeD7) for more information
